backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage, authorization mixins, and extensive data types for user profiles, contributions, geography, and proposals.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that converts old contribution log state into the new structure while preserving log entries.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend documentation and source files used in the project.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document outlining Whisper's vision, hierarchical installations, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Spec describing the complaint category suggestion system, including backend storage arrays and location-based issue mapping.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide with prerequisites, configuration, and instructions for deploying the system to ICP.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes detailing homepage redesign changes including hero assets, contrast fixes, typography, spacing, and Secretary UI adjustments.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased development plan describing staged feature rollout from architecture to multi-installation support and escalation.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Documentation of the Secretary assistant’s navigation registry system for routing users to pages or actions.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Manual smoke test covering full instance creation, moderation, issue reporting, task management, and key UI regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Regression checklist validating logo rendering, header styling, profile loading, navigation, geography suggestions, Secretary flows, and base-path deployment.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_SECRETARY_FLOWS: Smoke test for Secretary widget covering menu behavior, discovery paths, issue reporting modes, keyword/deep-link navigation, recovery states, and back-to-menu flows.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Visual design guidelines defining Whisper’s color palette, typography, and accessibility rules for consistent civic-themed UI styling.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the app root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: Teal Whisper logo SVG containing circular icon and stylized internal shapes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application wrapper handling routing, secretary interactions, lazy‑loaded pages, and navigation registry setup.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Header component providing navigation, logo rendering, admin/user controls, and popstate-based client-side routing.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Renders a stylized circular icon container with size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Displays a spinner with an optional label and configurable size.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Authentication button handling login/logout states with optional icons.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User menu showing profile info, navigation to profile, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating an instance with name generation, geo selection, validation, and proposal submission.
County dropdown that loads counties for a state with error and loading handling.
Place dropdown that lists places for a county with error and loading states.
State selector loading all states with support for errors and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details with tabs for overview and tasks, using proposal and category data.
Renders a task list for a proposal, with ability to create tasks and toggle completion using related hooks. Handles loading, errors, and form interactions with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Displays a dialog with full proposal details, fetching live data and optionally auto-opening an Issue Project sub-dialog. Shows geography info, status, description, and handles nested dialog behavior.
Shows a grid of proposals with loading, error, and empty states, and opens the detail dialog on selection. Listens for navigation events to auto-open a specific proposal.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: A dismissible UI card prompting users to try the Secretary widget, with title, description, and an action button.
Provides a searchable typeahead input for selecting geographic options with keyboard navigation and optional loading state.
Implements the main Secretary chat widget, wiring the FlowEngineBrain to UI, handling messages, actions, geography data, and suggestions. Manages input, scrolling, and state updates.
Creates a portal-backed mount point for the Secretary widget, ensuring it renders into an overlay root when open.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContributionL: Fetches paginated admin contribution logs from the backend using the authenticated actor.
Fetches and caches the caller's user profile and provides a mutation to save profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Provides category suggestions and full category lists based on hierarchy level and search input.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance-name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks and updates the current route path based on browser navigation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Deletes a proposal via the backend and invalidates related moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Hides a proposal using the backend and refreshes moderation and proposal caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity persistence.
Fetches, creates, and updates tasks for a proposal with optimistic UI updates and cache syncing.
Syncs a React state value with localStorage while handling SSR safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches admin moderation queue via React Query and maps proposals into UI-friendly ModerationItem objects.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and returns ready/error state with automatic reset on src changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, proposals, admin status, and location-based data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Provides simple chat state management with message history and menu visibility controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Maintains a registry of navigable destinations with keyword lookup and action execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Stores and retrieves temporary client-side proposal category values and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update proposal status and invalidate proposal and moderation-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks for fetching states, counties, and places with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme and utility definitions featuring OKLCH color variables and layout helpers.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Utilities to format proposal geography data, including labels, population, structured parts, and display strings.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options with keyword matching and deep link helpers.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryReportIssueDat: Fetches geography details and top issues from the backend with combined error‑handled reporting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryTopIssuesMessa: Provides methods to retrieve and format top issues for states, counties, and cities with user-friendly messaging.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI text copy for product, navigation, proposals, and other interface sections.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, normalizes, and parses WHISPER‑prefixed instance names based on geography level.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity, and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin-only moderation dashboard handling authentication checks and rendering moderation items, logs, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Cont: Admin UI section that fetches and paginates contribution logs with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Component rendering a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and action confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Renders the Geography page with header, navigation back button, and placeholder content for upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing authenticated users to view and edit their name and profile image with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/FlowEngineB: Flow engine–based implementation of SecretaryBrain managing intents, slots, navigation, geography data, and conversation context.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/hooks.ts: Utility functions for composing and filtering flow event listeners, including no-op and console logging variants.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/SecretaryBr: Interface defining the SecretaryBrain abstraction, including input handling, state access, view models, and navigation events.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryCop: Provides static English UI strings and templates for Secretary flows, including menu text, discovery prompts, issue-reporting copy, and slot-filling messages.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryPro: Defines helper functions that generate contextualized prompt strings for issues, discovery results, slot-filling, and unknown-input responses.
frontend/src/secretary/decisions/secreta: Contains pure decision functions that choose next nodes, determine geography, check for existing instances, and validate report-issue progression.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/flows.ts: Declares data-driven node definitions for all Secretary conversation flows, including UI behavior, messages, and transitions between states.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/runner.ts: Implements the flow controller that executes transitions, updates context, emits events, and returns node view models while coordinating special node logic.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/types.ts: Defines core types for nodes, transitions, actions, context, and UI view models used throughout the Secretary flow engine.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRegist: Maps intents to their required and optional slots and slot order, and exposes functions to access flow definitions and a navigation handler.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRunner: Implements slot-driven intent flow: finds missing slots, fills them, generates prompts, and triggers intent completion navigation.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyL: Performs backend-assisted state/county/place extraction from free text using NLP helpers and hierarchical matching.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyN: Provides deterministic text-matching utilities for identifying states, counties, and places in free text.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/index.ts: Barrel file exporting intent, flow, repair, and geography utilities and types.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/intentClas: Rule-based classifier mapping user text to predefined intents using keyword heuristics.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/repair.ts: Detects correction messages and identifies which slot to repair, clearing affected slots.
Defines getters/setters for slot values, clearing logic, dependency resets, and empty slot bag creation.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/types.ts: Defines intent types, slot names, slot value structures, and intent context interfaces.
frontend/src/secretary/observability/sec: Lightweight tracing utility storing recent internal events in a ring buffer for debugging.
frontend/src/secretary/state/secretaryCo: Maintains conversation context with helpers to reset, update messages, and clear slots or flow-specific state.
frontend/src/secretary/ui/secretaryViewM: Transforms flow node models into UI-ready view models and resolves icon names.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Resolves static asset URLs relative to Vite's base path with normalization.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements a custom browser event system for triggering and listening to project navigation actions from the Secretary flow.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps backend error messages to simplified, user-friendly English strings for UI display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theming, color variables, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and current project status for the stable‑memory contribution log implementation effort.
